name: LakshmiMantra
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lakshmi mantra
des:
OM SHRI MAHALAXMAI NAMAH

Take your meditation to the next level with 100% original certified Rudraksh Mala 108 beads.
Considered to be a gift of Shiva, Rudraksh Mala has amazing physical and spiritual benefits.
Each Dhyaan-mala is personally energized by DhyaanGuru.

Maha-Laxmi is the divine mother who takes care of all who take care of themselves and others. Those who worship Laxmi, tend to perform the best in their Karma to gain health, wealth and success in Life. She nurtures one to perform well in all his/her endeavors. She blesses all who share part of their knowledge, wisdom and material with those in need. She gives an opportunity to lift one from life of poverty to richness.
Listening or chanting this mantra daily will bring tremendous wealth, good health and peace in your life.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
